Name: Paddington Bear Martini
Ingredients: 22.5 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tangy orange marmalade with gin and pisco rounded with bianco vermouth.
